The Igbo API is a multidialectal, audio-: API Igbo bụ ọkọwookwu Igbo a kọwara na Bekee nke nwere ọgbara olumba, nwee ọdio, ma gherekwa oghe idebanye ihe.
Our main goal is to make an easy-to-acce: Ebumnobi ka anyị mkpa bụ imepụta ebenchọpụta asụsụ Igbo dị mfe iru aka, jupụta ejupụta, ma bụrụ mkpụrụasụsụ Igbo.
The Igbo API hosts and serves all word a: API Igbo bụ ebe mkpụrụokwu niile na data omụmaatụ ahịrịokwu e gosipụtara na Nkọwa okwu dị. ọkọwookwu ịntaneetị izugbe anyị.
The initial words and examples that popu: Mkpụrụokwu na ọmụmaatụ mbụ jupụtara na API a si na ọkọwookwu Igbo Kay Williamson nke ọ kpọrọ “Dictionary of Ònìchà Igbo”.
This is an open-source project created b: Ihe a bụ ọrụ isi ndebanye ya ghe oghe nke Ijemma Onwuzulike mepụtara.
